forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with a steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 57F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. ESE winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 48F. ESE winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. SE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 11C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
